function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependency on external networks for technical knowledge","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid transfer of resources particularly human resources and technical skills from one project to another","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Change in customer expectations and service requirements due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decoupling of service offerings to adapt to new customer requirements","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Direct interactions with employees and customers can facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid deployment of resources and reconfiguration of business systems may lead to oversight of health and safety measures, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of remote patient inspection and consulting capability","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of fitness centers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Managers not providing complete understanding of agility capabilities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of strategic sensitivity in service smes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on digitalization-related changes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of contagion in a closed fitness studio environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate capacity for remote service delivery","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on telemedicine without proper training and protocols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid development of software without thorough testing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent travel to different cities for real estate tours","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facial recognition and photo processing software usage in public digital environments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unstructured interviews may lead to inconsistent data collection and analysis.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zoom video conferencing services may be vulnerable to security breaches and privacy concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service smes may struggle to adapt to a changing service ecosystem due to lack of dynamic capabilities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service smes may face challenges in maintaining strategic agility and adapting to post-covid conditions, leading to a decline in performance and market relevance.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smes in the service sector may struggle to maintain close customer relationships and sustained organizational learning and innovation during covid-19 and beyond.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in service systems due to enhanced social and emotional links with individual actors within the service system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse effects of internal processes and complex structures on the deployment of co-creation capabilities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective deployment of co-creation capabilities leading to lack of deep relationships with customers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resourcefulness in smes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate co-creation capabilities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions caused by inadequate co-creation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of flexibility in highly efficient companies due to focus on increasing efficiency","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on a small leadership team in service smes for strategic decisions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decay of meta-capabilities due to focus on day-to-day operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for disruptions in market-testing and thought experiments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of leadership unity and commitment to difficult decisions in times of turbulence","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate resource fluidity and reconfiguring capabilities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to rapidly implement resource allocation and competency adjustments in response to opportunities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting in-depth interviews with managers of service smes during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing new services and transforming existing ones during covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilizing co-creation and dynamic capabilities to foster agility in service smes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smes being severely affected by the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agility in decision-making processes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on examples from large companies for agility implications in strategic decision-making","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases in the workplace due to close proximity of employees.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing new technologies without considering the realistic and beneficial aspects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in human interaction in offline retail spaces leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards more online shopping leading to greater reliance on delivery and logistics networks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in achieving a seamless omnichannel shopping experience","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical store crowding and safety management","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated adoption of digital solutions in traditional retailing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neutralization of physical retailers’ characteristic strengths due to pandemic measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical and human touch in online retailing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"}]}
